text: 9.54: 2 Kin 1.9-16Mba Samarian ki gumgi, mbe mba tɨvar Zisas ga muuŋgim, mba Zisas phorga rui guma phunini, Zems gum Zon, mani mba tɨva gangiap kha nzambaran Zisas ga muuŋgi, “Guman Rum, ndu nza vuzvugirim, nza Hevenan Fhe Bakɨmen kamɨrim, ana vhava sararim, ana zɨrɨv kha gumgi shigirim, mbe vhɨzgirga?”
